entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [BUG] 'Microsoft.NET.Sdk.iOS.Manifest-7.0.100 16.4.7125' has incompatible package type. #18604
  • BoxView will not render on iOS if it's parent is not visible when the page is built, but is made visible afterwards. #18587
  • Events should be triggered on iOS #18582
  • Compile error multilanguage app upgrade existing project to .net 8 (visual studio preview version 6) #18576
  • [Android] .NET 8 TabBar Title is bold vs .NET 7 TabBar which is not bold #18574
    .NET 8 SR1
  • MAUI SR9 7.0.100 breaks iOS build #18573
  • [iOS] canvas.GetStringSize() not considering newlines #18572
  • MS Store upload: Package acceptance validation error #18571
  • Android: Pinch gesture not working properly in Carousel #18569
    .NET 8 SR1
  • .NET 7: Can't add a ListView to a grid position if the column's with is "auto" #18563
  • [MAUI]Enlarge My recipes page and then zoom out, the pictures will be arranged vertically. #18559
    .NET 8 SR1
  • TabbedPage with ToolbarPlacement = Bottom: SelectedTabColor does not move highlight to correct tab if the tab is changed programmatically #18558
    Backlog
  • [iOS] BindableLayout or a CollectionView in a CollectionView display bug #18557
  • Localization of MenuBarItem on Android not working #18556
  • Whole App Shell and Shell content disapear when changing between tabs fast enough (Release mode on Android) #18555

Closed

  • Shapes without handlers shouldn't be added as LogicalChildren #16919
    .NET 8 SR1
  • Maui Popup Randomly Disrupts the Transitional View #18474
  • [MacOSX][Label] Label won't display text in italic #15912
  • Java.Lang.RuntimeException: Unable to instantiate activity #18523
  • Entry stays under the Keyboard when focused on iOS on .Net 8 #18564
  • [iOS] Updating the text of a label destroys the ScrollView layout #18496
    .NET 8 SR1
  • MAUI Templates not found after install #18232
  • Couldn't install or uninstall AndroidTools_Xamarin #18358
  • Error #18357
  • [MAUI] Ugly picture with MediaPicker.CapturePhotoAsync on macOS #17481
  • iOS SearchBar Unfocused Event not fired, Keyboard not disappearing. #18369
  • Date not formatted correctly on iPhone device #18527

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0.1xx] Move MAUI Blazor template files to match ASP.NET Blazor template #18608
  • Bump the windowsappsdk group with 3 updates #18606
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump the androidx group with 16 updates #18605
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [ios] fix memory leak in `ImageButton` #18602
    platform/iOS 🍎, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 + Servicing
  • Bump NUnit from 3.13.3 to 3.14.0 #18601
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump powershell from 7.3.8 to 7.3.9 #18600
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.Web.WebView2 from 1.0.2088.41 to 1.0.2151.40 #18599
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump MemoryAnalyzers from 0.1.0-beta.4 to 0.1.0-beta.5 #18598
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump BenchmarkDotNet from 0.13.5.2136 to 0.13.10 #18597
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Tizen.UIExtensions.NUI from 0.9.0 to 0.9.2 #18596
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump CommunityToolkit.Mvvm from 8.1.0 to 8.2.2 #18595
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump System.CodeDom from 7.0.0 to 8.0.0-rc.2.23479.6 #18594
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers from 8.0.0-preview.23472.1 to 8.0.0-preview1.23165.1 #18593
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.UITest from 4.1.4 to 4.3.1 #18592
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.Firebase.AppIndexing from 120.0.0.12 to 120.0.0.15 #18591
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump the xunit group with 3 updates #18588
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Arrange content based on arrangement bounds rather than viewport bounds #18586
  • [net8.0] Attempt to solve CI errors - could not copy / unable to copy with `<BuildInParallel>false</BuildInParallel>` #18585
  • [android] fix memory leak with `CarouselView` #18584
    platform/android 🤖, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 + Servicing
  • fix: maui template won't build on Linux #18580
    community ✨
  • Better ARM support iOS device tests #18568
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/essentials 🍞, area/testing
  • [Housekeeping] Added UI Test to validate project template #18567
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Added TimePicker TimeSelected Event #18565
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-datetimepicker
  • Fix package downgrade errors by fixing versions causing error and introducing/consolidating variables #18562
  • [Android] Fix Enter key triggering ReturnCommand on Entry #18560
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry

Merged

  • Fix filename case sensitivity #18561
  • Filter GetVisualTreeDescendants to not check elements with null handlers #18539
    .NET 8 SR1
  • Move MAUI Blazor template files to match ASP.NET Blazor template #18581
    area/blazor 🕸️, area/templates 📄
  • Configure an explicit time/zone in dependabot config #18603
  • Enable Dependabot #18511
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Revert "Ensure that viewport calculations for iOS ScrollView account … #18579
  • Attempt to solve CI errors - could not copy / unable to copy with `<BuildInParallel>false</BuildInParallel>` #18570
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Update car image/size #18577
  • Update car image/size #18550
    area/templates 📄
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #18554
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [controls] fix memory leak with `CarouselView` & `INotifyCollectionChanged` #18267
    area/collectionview 📃, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 + Servicing

Updated

  • Add support for running Appium tests with BrowserStack #18312
  • [ios] fix memory leak in `Frame`, `VisualElementRenderer` #18552
    platform/iOS 🍎, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 + Servicing
  • Resizetizer issues fixes - nuget bumps #16100
    area/single project ☝️, stale, Under Consideration
  • Only use custom image sizing with ImageButtons #18521
    area/controls 🎮
  • Invalidate Shapes BackgroundColor #18183
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎, .NET 8 SR1
  • [Catalyst] Allow to use a custom WKUIDelegate on WebView #18483
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, area/controls 🎮, control-webview, Under Consideration
  • Fix for #11991 - CollectionView SelectedItem BackgroundColor is always Gray on iOS #17464
    area/collectionview 📃, community ✨, stale, Under Consideration
  • [X] allow x:Type extension for BPConverter #18540
    area/Xaml </>
